excerpt.rendered:
From the 2017 series, this is Cask 12 which is matured in a single European Sherry Oak Hogshead. This is bottled at 59.4% abv with only 257 bottles ever produced.

ESC 2017/ESH-6270/12
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Hogshead
Distilled: 20th April 2005
Bottled: 20th December 2017
One of 257 bottles

Cask number #6270

Distillery : Macallan
Age : 12
Vintage : 2005
ABV : 59.40%
